text: The Diocese of Milos or Diocese of Melos () was a Roman Catholic diocese located on the volcanic Greek island of Milos in the Aegean Sea, just north of the Sea of Crete. In 1700, it was suppressed."Diocese of Milos (Melos)" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved June 16, 2016"Diocese of Milos" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved June 16, 2016 In 1800 it was restored as a Titular Episcopal See. ==Ordinaries== ;Erected 1207 *Nikolaus Langen, O.P.
